Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/1985, off John Butcher (ATL)...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago on 5/18/1985...
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 8/13/1985...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Philadelphia on 6/22/1986...
Injured on 8/1/1986 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/9/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Released by Seattle on 2/14/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/23/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $7,987,500 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 6/2/1987...
Hit 3 homeruns against Atlanta, driving in 4 runs on 6/24/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1987, hitting .333 with 11 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against San Diego, driving in 4 runs on 7/17/1987...
Sets a new season NL-Record for HR with 44 on 9/28/1987...
Hit 3 homeruns against San Diego, driving in 5 runs on 9/28/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1987, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1987...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 3/3/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $9,984,375 per year...
Injured on 4/6/1988 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1988, hitting .433 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 3/3/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $12,480,469 per year...
Injured on 4/30/1989 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 3/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $15,600,586 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/3/1991 to a minor league contract.
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 6/3/1991...
10/14/1991: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $3,190,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 2/9/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $1,700,000 per year...
